pr_title: Drop writing min/max statistics for TIMESTAMP columns for Hive tables

timeline.bodyText: This comment was vestigial, there is no longer such a thing "legacy" and "non-legacy" timestamp.
timeline.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText: in a sense, this was valid, right? and OK to keep?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: The issue is that it will not be ever called is we disable MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE value statistics type for timestamp columns. See createColumnStatisticsForEmptyPartition above
replies.author: losipiuk

timeline.bodyText: lets create a follow up issue and keep a TODO here, so it's easier to impl later
timeline.author: findepi

timeline.message: Drop writing min/max statistics for TIMESTAMP columns for Hive tables
Drop writing min/max statistics for TIMESTAMP columns for Hive tables
